item.title: OpenSSH Hardening Tips
item.description: In this post I’ve collected some tips to harden the default OpenSSH configuration on an Ubuntu LTS server. SSH protocol is usually used to connect to a remote machine securely. There are a lot of configuration options which can be used to make a server more secure. Disabling some features can help too if they are not needed.
